# bottomTrailing(relativeTo:)

**Type Method**

The bottom trailing corner of the frame, in the given user interface layout direction.

static func bottomTrailing(relativeTo layoutDirection: NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection) -> NSCursor.FrameResizePosition
